programme.title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy
programme.sub-title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy 301: Hit Me With Your Best Shot
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the shooting, the couples gather in shock at a local Las Vegas hospital, reeling from the events that took place as one life hangs in the balance.

programme.title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy
programme.sub-title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy 302: Life Is Like Monkey Bars
programme.desc: A new face enters the fold amidst flashbacks and flash-forwards of the participants complicated relationships with each other. Meanwhile, the consequences of the rooftop shooting reach dire straits.

programme.title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy
programme.sub-title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy 303: The Bridge
programme.desc: Sawyer finally chooses between Caroline and Maggie. Carson comes across information about The Experiment that sends him deeper into his downward spiral.

programme.title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy
programme.sub-title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy 304: The Questions We Ask
programme.desc: Maggie is showing signs of a behavior that Sawyer doesn't know what to make of. Sincere has a new opportunity and Connor is getting closer to finding Harvey. Carson is on the brink of losing his mind, but will he find his answers to The Experiment?

programme.title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy
programme.sub-title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy 305: Todays Choice Is Tomorrows Consequence
programme.desc: Diandra meets someone new, and it's electric. The Experiment offers Sawyer information that will shake his relationship with Maggie to the core.

programme.title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy
programme.sub-title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy 306: Divine Intervention
programme.desc: Connor is closing in on Harvey, but what part of himself will he have to lose when he finds him? Carson has found meaning in his life, but is he truly over Maggie?

programme.title: Hush
programme.sub-title: Hush 201: Feedback
programme.desc: Left to rot, Dr. Draya Logan is on a mission to gain her freedom while simultaneously keeping tabs on Gina, Jordan, and Syleena.

programme.title: Hush
programme.sub-title: Hush 202: Control
programme.desc: Draya gives Mayor Dupri an ultimatum that could grant her the freedom she desires, changing everything for the women.

programme.title: Hush
programme.sub-title: Hush 203: Come Back to Me
programme.desc: Draya is back, and trying to move on, but finds herself revisiting her past life when she gets a special visitor.

programme.title: Hush
programme.sub-title: Hush 204: If
programme.desc: Draya finds herself back into the arms of Maxwell while everything starts to crumble for the women.

programme.title: Hush
programme.sub-title: Hush 205: Miss You Much
programme.desc: When Draya finds out what Linc has done to Jordan, she rallys the women together for a fail proof plan involving Mona Dee.

programme.title: Hush
programme.sub-title: Hush 206: Son of a Gun
programme.desc: In the midst of planning for her new show, Draya finds herself at odds with the one person who has had her back through it all.

programme.title: Hush
programme.sub-title: Hush 207: You Want This
programme.desc: Draya finds herself at the front of the biggest night of Clair's career and the creation of a super intense plan that could free herself and the girls forever.

programme.title: Hush
programme.sub-title: Hush 208: Shoulda Know Better
programme.desc: Draya's Big Night has arrived with the live taping premiere of The Dr. Draya Show while the women execute the plan to take Linc out.

programme.title: Stuck With You
programme.sub-title: Stuck With You 101: Lemons and Oranges
programme.desc: It couple Candance and Luvell are reminded of the complications surrounding their secret when challenged by a prying and popular podcast host, Tee.

programme.title: Stuck With You
programme.sub-title: Stuck With You 102: Beware of the Ex
programme.desc: Candace's sexy ex, Vaughn, comes to town and makes it clear he still has his eye on the prize, threatening Luvell in more than one way. Mora, emotionally lost in her

programme.title: Stuck With You
programme.sub-title: Stuck With You 103: If Only For a Night
programme.desc: After lunch with a super fan drums up old feelings between Candace and Luvell, they plan a date that ends up being a night neither one of them will forget. Mora finally gets the date of her dream, but it ends up a nightmare.

programme.title: Stuck With You
programme.sub-title: Stuck With You 104: With These Vows
programme.desc: Candace's Aunt Claire comes to town with big news. Candace and Luvell attempt to keep things less complicated between them by vowing to abstain from casual sex with each other. Unfortunately Candace learns Luvell's struggle goes beyond the physical.

programme.title: Stuck With You
programme.sub-title: Stuck With You 105: Convenience of Comfort
programme.desc: A crazy night of bachelor and bachelorette parties for Aunt Claire and Terrence leads to some hard truths amongst the ladies and fellas.

programme.title: Stuck With You
programme.sub-title: Stuck With You 106: No Regrets
programme.desc: Candace and Luvell come face to face with the true state of their relationship. Katrina's deep secret is revealed while Mora puts herself in a very compromising position.

programme.title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy
programme.sub-title: Should I Stay Or Should I Go?
programme.desc: As each couple finally makes the choice whether to stay together or leave their original spouse, poignant moments reveal insights to their lives prior to 'The Experiment'. Dark pasts and twisted secrets come to light.

programme.title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy
programme.sub-title: It Ain'T Over Til It'S Over
programme.desc: After the dramatic reveal of their choices to stay or leave, the participants of The Experiment attempt to process the new lives they now face. But The Experiment isn't done with them just yet.

programme.title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy
programme.sub-title: Unspoken Agendas
programme.desc: Each participant seriously considers their options when The Experiment offers them a 3-day reprieve, but they only have 24 hours to decide.

programme.title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy
programme.sub-title: Once Upon A Time In Vegas
programme.desc: When The Experiment drops off the individuals taking advantage of the 3-day reprieve in an undisclosed location, they soon rediscover the reasons they fell in love and are forced to confront the ugly truths tearing them apart.

programme.title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy
programme.sub-title: The Decision Remix
programme.desc: As the reprieve comes to an end, everyone must choose wisely as The Experiment offers them a chance to decide, once and for all, to stay with or leave their original spouses.

programme.title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy
programme.sub-title: Grass Is Greener
programme.desc: Having made their final decisions, the participants begin to move on with their lives only to be brought back into The Experiment by a common dark force that connects them all in a mysterious way.
